publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4593 Kenneth Gibson: Ayrshire Ladies’ County Golf Association—That the Parliament congratulates the Ayrshire Ladies’ County Golf Association on the celebration of its centenary; notes its important work over the last 100 years in furthering the interests of Scottish ladies’, junior and girls’ amateur golf, and wishes the association well in its junior competition in August and its senior team’s participation in the inter-county competition to be held later this year.

S3M-4593 Ayrshire Ladies’ County Golf Association (lodged on 13 July 2009) Jamie McGrigor*, John Scott*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Jack McConnell*
